title: Marscape
summary: Enjoy the Mars Escape watch face for your android watch wear.
developerAddress: House # 616, Street # 69, Sector I-8/3, Islamabad, Pakistan.
description: Escape the mars before the Martian attack. This is a beautiful watch face for the android watch wear. The color theme reflects it of Mars. When even you are bored and try to make your mood lighten up then this is simply the best watch face. Illustration design is used in this watch face and funky colors are also used. Enjoy the funky colors and fonts used. The time is digital display with day and date in numeric. When the watch is not in use the watch face goes into ambient mode which save the battery just by showing the time.
